Group.title: Services
Group.description:
The best protection against vulnerable software is running less software. This section describes how to review the software which WRLinux installs on a system and disable software which is not needed. It then enumerates the software packages installed on a default WRLinux system and provides guidance about which ones can be safely disabled.
WRLinux provides a convenient minimal install option that essentially installs the bare necessities for a functional system. When building WRLinux servers, it is highly recommended to select the minimal packages and then build up the system from there.
